front.title: Homenet Naming and Service Discovery Architecture

abstract.t: This document recommends a naming and service discovery resolution architecture for homenets. This architecture covers the publication and resolution of names of hosts on the homenet both within the homenet and on the public internet, and the use of such names for offering and discovering services that exist on the homenet both within the homenet and on the public internet. Security and privacy implications and techniques for automatically and administratively setting security and privacy policies for such names are also described.
